verses.verse: Give <S%H238>ear,<s%> O ye <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and I will <S%H1696>speak;<s%> and <S%H8085>hear,<s%> O <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

My <S%H3948>doctrine<s%> shall <S%H6201>drop<s%> as the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> my <S%H565>speech<s%> shall <S%H5140>distill<s%> as the <S%H2919>dew,<s%> as the small <S%H8164>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the tender <S%H1877>herb,<s%> and as the <S%H7241>showers<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the grass: <S%H6212><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> I will <S%H7121>publish<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3051>ascribe<s%> ye <S%H1433>greatness<s%> unto our <S%H430>God.<s%>

He is the <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> his <S%H6467>work<s%> is <S%H8549>perfect:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H530>truth<s%> and <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> <S%H6662>just<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> is <S%H1931>he.<s%>

They have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves, their <S%H3971>spot<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> the spot of his <S%H1121>children:<s%> they are a <S%H6141>perverse<s%> and <S%H6618>crooked<s%> <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

Do ye <S%H2063>thus<s%> <S%H1580>requite<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3808>unwise?<s%> <S%H2450><s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> that hath <S%H7069>bought<s%> thee? hath <S%H1931>he<s%> not <S%H6213>made<s%> thee, and <S%H3559>established<s%> thee?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old,<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of many <S%H1755>generations:<s%> <S%H1755><s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> and he will <S%H5046>show<s%> thee; thy <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and they will <S%H559>tell<s%> thee.

When the most <S%H5945>High<s%> <S%H5157>divided<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> their inheritance, when he <S%H6504>separated<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>Adam,<s%> he <S%H5324>set<s%> the <S%H1367>bounds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> is his <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

He <S%H4672>found<s%> him in a <S%H4057>desert<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and in the <S%H8414>waste<s%> <S%H3214>howling<s%> <S%H3452>wilderness;<s%> he led him <S%H5437>about,<s%> he <S%H995>instructed<s%> him, he <S%H5341>kept<s%> him as the <S%H380>apple<s%> of his <S%H5869>eye.<s%>

As an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> stirreth <S%H5782>up<s%> her <S%H7064>nest,<s%> <S%H7363>fluttereth<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> her <S%H1469>young,<s%> spreadeth <S%H6566>abroad<s%> her <S%H3671>wings,<s%> <S%H3947>taketh<s%> them, <S%H5375>beareth<s%> them <S%H5921>on<s%> her wings: <S%H84><s%>
So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> did <S%H5148>lead<s%> him, and there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him.

He made him <S%H7392>ride<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that he might <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H8570>increase<s%> of the <S%H7704>fields;<s%> and he made him to <S%H3243>suck<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%> out of the <S%H4480>rock,<s%> <S%H5553><s%> and <S%H8081>oil<s%> out of the <S%H4480>flinty<s%> <S%H2496><s%> <S%H6697>rock;<s%>

Butter <S%H2529><s%> of <S%H1241>kine,<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> of <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and <S%H352>rams<s%> of the <S%H1121>breed<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat;<s%> and thou didst <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H2561>pure<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6025>grape.<s%>

But <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%> waxed <S%H8080>fat,<s%> and <S%H1163>kicked:<s%> thou art waxen <S%H8080>fat,<s%> thou art grown <S%H5666>thick,<s%> thou art <S%H3780>covered<s%> with fatness; then he <S%H5203>forsook<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> which <S%H6213>made<s%> him, and lightly <S%H5034>esteemed<s%> the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> of his <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
They provoked him to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with <S%H2114>strange<s%> gods, with <S%H8441>abominations<s%> provoked they him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

They <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto <S%H7700>devils,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to <S%H433>God;<s%> to <S%H430>gods<s%> whom they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> to <S%H2319>new<s%> gods that <S%H935>came<s%> newly <S%H4480>up,<s%> <S%H7138><s%> whom your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8175>feared<s%> <S%H3808>not.<s%>
Of the <S%H6697>Rock<s%> that <S%H3205>begot<s%> thee thou art <S%H7876>unmindful,<s%> and hast <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H2342>formed<s%> thee.
And when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, he <S%H5006>abhorred<s%> them, because of the <S%H4480>provoking<s%> <S%H3708><s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and of his <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5641>hide<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> them, I will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> their <S%H319>end<s%> shall be: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are a very <S%H8419>froward<s%> <S%H1755>generation,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> in whom is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H529>faith.<s%>

They <S%H1992><s%> have moved me to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with that which is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H410>God;<s%> they have provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>vanities:<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> will move them to <S%H7065>jealousy<s%> with those which are <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H5971>people;<s%> I will provoke them to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with a <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger,<s%> and shall <S%H3344>burn<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H7585>hell,<s%> and shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> with her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and set on <S%H3857>fire<s%> the <S%H4146>foundations<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains.<s%>
I will <S%H5595>heap<s%> <S%H7451>mischiefs<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them; I will <S%H3615>spend<s%> mine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> upon them.

They shall be <S%H4198>burnt<s%> with <S%H7458>hunger,<s%> and <S%H3898>devoured<s%> with burning <S%H7565>heat,<s%> and with <S%H4815>bitter<s%> <S%H6986>destruction:<s%> I will also <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H8127>teeth<s%> of <S%H929>beasts<s%> upon them, <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of <S%H2119>serpents<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H4480>without,<s%> <S%H2351><s%> and <S%H367>terror<s%> <S%H4480>within,<s%> <S%H2315><s%> shall <S%H7921>destroy<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> the young <S%H970>man<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> the <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> the <S%H3243>suckling<s%> also <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of gray <S%H7872>hairs.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> I would scatter them into <S%H6284>corners,<s%> I would make the <S%H2143>remembrance<s%> of them to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from among <S%H4480>men:<s%> <S%H376><s%>

Were it not <S%H3884>that<s%> I <S%H1481>feared<s%> the <S%H3708>wrath<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should behave themselves <S%H5234>strangely,<s%> and <S%H6435>lest<s%> they should <S%H559>say,<s%> Our <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>high,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6>void<s%> of <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H8394>understanding<s%> in them.
O <S%H3863>that<s%> they were <S%H2449>wise,<s%> that they <S%H7919>understood<s%> <S%H2063>this,<s%> that they would <S%H995>consider<s%> their latter <S%H319>end!<s%>

How <S%H349><s%> should <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5127>put<s%> ten <S%H7233>thousand<s%> to <S%H5127>flight,<s%> <S%H518>except<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H6697>Rock<s%> had <S%H4376>sold<s%> them, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had shut them <S%H5462>up?<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H6697>rock<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> as our <S%H6697>Rock,<s%> even our <S%H341>enemies<s%> themselves being <S%H6414>judges.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> their <S%H1612>vine<s%> is of the <S%H4480>vine<s%> <S%H1612><s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom,<s%> and of the <S%H4480>fields<s%> <S%H7709><s%> of <S%H6017>Gomorrah:<s%> their <S%H6025>grapes<s%> are <S%H6025>grapes<s%> of <S%H7219>gall,<s%> their <S%H811>clusters<s%> are bitter: <S%H4846><s%>
Their <S%H3196>wine<s%> is the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons,<s%> and the <S%H393>cruel<s%> <S%H7219>venom<s%> of <S%H6620>asps.<s%>
Is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> laid up in <S%H3647>store<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me and sealed <S%H2856>up<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures?<s%>

To me belongeth <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and <S%H8005>recompense;<s%> their <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall <S%H4131>slide<s%> in due <S%H6256>time:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand,<s%> and the things that shall <S%H6264>come<s%> upon them make <S%H2363>haste.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and repent <S%H5162>himself<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> their <S%H3027>power<s%> is <S%H235>gone,<s%> and there is <S%H657>none<s%> shut <S%H6113>up,<s%> or <S%H5800>left.<s%>
And he shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H335>Where<s%> are their <S%H430>gods,<s%> their <S%H6697>rock<s%> in whom they <S%H2620>trusted,<s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of their <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and <S%H8354>drank<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of their drink <S%H5257>offerings?<s%> let them rise <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H5826>help<s%> you, and <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5921><s%> your <S%H5643>protection.<s%>

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> even <S%H589>I,<s%> am <S%H1931>he,<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>god<s%> <S%H5978>with<s%> me: <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H4191>kill,<s%> and I make <S%H2421>alive;<s%> I <S%H4272>wound,<s%> and <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7495>heal:<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any that can <S%H5337>deliver<s%> out of my <S%H4480>hand.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I <S%H8150>whet<s%> my <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> take <S%H270>hold<s%> on <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> I will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to mine <S%H6862>enemies,<s%> and will <S%H7999>reward<s%> them that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me.

I will make mine <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H7937>drunk<s%> with <S%H4480>blood,<s%> <S%H1818><s%> and my <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and that with the <S%H4480>blood<s%> <S%H1818><s%> of the <S%H2491>slain<s%> and of the <S%H7633>captives,<s%> from the <S%H4480>beginning<s%> <S%H7218><s%> of <S%H6546>revenges<s%> upon the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

Rejoice, <S%H7442><s%> O ye <S%H1471>nations,<s%> with his <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he will <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and will <S%H7725>render<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> to his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and will be <S%H3722>merciful<s%> unto his <S%H127>land,<s%> and to his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1931>he,<s%> and <S%H1954>Hoshea<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H7760>Set<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H5749>testify<s%> among you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> to <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H7386>vain<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> you; <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is your <S%H2416>life:<s%> and through <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> ye shall <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H6106>selfsame<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
